column5: I've been hearing alot about the Montgomery rapids on the nottawasaga river were are they?
It's not labeled on google maps
Find Knox Rd East on Google maps.  Shouldn't be very hard to figure out after that.
Thanks do you think there's salmon going through there right know
Probably but they're not as ripe as some people like them at this time of the year.
I believe Bill has been more then over helpful.
